title: Problems with sound at PIxel 4a. I can't change the volume during the call. The sound is very loud
content: Problems with sound at PIxel 4a 4g. I can't change the volume during the call. The sound is very loud. In one update the problem was solved but since the last two updates the problem has returned. It's very annoying when you're in a room to hear and the rest of what you're talking on the phone is like putting the speaker on.It can be solved or I have to change my phone???
